title: Welp RIP ancient coin

embed.description: The PBE has been updated! Continue reading for more information. WARNING: PBE content is tentative and iterative - what you see may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers! Manage your expectations accordingly. REMEMBER: The PBE is a testing grounds for new, tentative, and sometimes radical changes.

body:
It's gonna be trash compared to {{item:3098}} after this change goes through:

Frost Queen's Claim {{item:3092}} 
+15 Gold (up from 2) per 10 seconds

Frostfang {{item:3098}} 
+15 Gold (up from 2) per 10 seconds
Spells and basic attacks against champions or buildings deal 10 (down from 15) additional damage and grant 12 Gold (up from 10)

Spellthief's Edge {{item:3303}} 
+10 Gold (up from 2) per 10 seconds

Sorry but looking at that, coin is totally outclassed now. I don't even think the health it gives, or even the active are worth losing out on so much gold.

I would think even champs like {{champion:16}} {{champion:40}} and {{champion:432}} would take this over {{item:3301}}. 

I mean, you don't even need to benefit from the onhit gold passive for this to be better than coin anymore.

Like, its a buff to all my supports so I don't wanna complain, but why get coin over spellthiefs now?

The hp vamp from dead minions? I don't think that is worth losing out on so much gold.

I hope {{item:3301}} will be recieving buffs along this path as well. Else it will be outclassed completely again.

replies.body: There's no way those changes go through. They're clearly unintended/have been put out incorrectly. You don't just make an item 8x more effective than it once was and leave it at that.

Its been on pbe for 2 days so far, no updates or statements changing.

Bugs/mistakes are usually fixed within a day.

I am... concerned but very pleased. This is only a buff for my support champion pool lmfao
Riot has said that they don't want support items to be so good that non-support laners start taking them...If I were an AP mid laner, Spellthief sounds like a very good option to start with now...

Sadly, Bard is already better with Frost queens claim. He can activate 2-3 ticks from it with one auto-attack that strikes within the AoE cone it makes later on from meep collection..It allows him to do some damage and pressure more (let alone grant more mana regen for more healing, and other spells) than he ever could with the coin. The only benefit the coin brings now is the Tier-3 movement speed buff from its top of line upgrade path. Even then, the frost-AoE shot is a lot more useful than the coin speed buff for the bard, allowing him to line up a good Stunning Q, or well-placed ultimate.

Spellthiefs has been tied in dominance with the Targons since they showed up. Coin has always been the lesser, weaker choice sadly. If anything, the buffs here are stupid, and the COIN needed the buff. The coin doesn't nearly give as much gold as the other two. Not even two coins can equal up to ONE spelltheif.

I think the idea is that Coin comes with the better utility in most cases. And is the safer choice. 

Shields and slows are not hard to come by. But a full team large speed boost isn't something you'll find as easily. 3 champions I think? Two of those require an ultimate. 

If Coin comes too close to the other two then it will easily out shine them. 

I'm sure these changes wont go through. It's just asking for players to abuse it. It's likely a typo.
It's been on PBE for 2 days now. No statements or changes.
Has it? S@20 is showing it as today's change.
